comment: Smart Data Models - CsConverter adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/CsConverter/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. DC side of the current source converter (CSC).

contents.name: alpha
contents.comment: Firing angle, typical value between 10 and 18 degrees for a rectifier. CSC state variable, result from power flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: gamma
contents.comment: Extinction angle. CSC state variable, result from power flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: maxAlpha
contents.comment: Maximum firing angle. CSC configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: maxGamma
contents.comment: Maximum extinction angle. CSC configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: maxIdc
contents.comment: The maximum direct current (Id) on the DC side at which the converter should operate. Converter configuration data use in power flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: minAlpha
contents.comment: Minimum firing angle. CSC configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: minGamma
contents.comment: Minimum extinction angle. CSC configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: minIdc
contents.comment: The minimum direct current (Id) on the DC side at which the converter should operate. CSC configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: operatingMode
contents.comment: Indicates whether the DC pole is operating as an inverter or as a rectifier. CSC control variable used in power flow. Default: None

contents.name: pPccControl
contents.comment: Default: None

contents.name: ratedIdc
contents.comment: Rated converter DC current, also called IdN. Converter configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: targetAlpha
contents.comment: Target firing angle. CSC control variable used in power flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: targetGamma
contents.comment: Target extinction angle. CSC  control variable used in power flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: targetIdc
contents.comment: DC current target value. CSC control variable used in power flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
